channel.title: How Do i get my server online using no-ip! danget
channel.description:
okay, i downloaded no-ip and signed up i created a host using MY IPADDRESS so i turn server online, then i went to moparscape 3.2 aryan client and typed in my no-ip.biz ip and it doesnt let me in.. "Error Connecting to server, Must be down?"..
someone help me
Thanks

item.title: How Do i get my server online using no-ip! danget
item.dc:creator: @Joshinator Joshinator
item.description:
@Joshinator wrote:

well it wont let me portforward.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2008, 01:39:53 PM[/size][hr]okay ive port forwarded now. now what?

Read full topic

item.title: How Do i get my server online using no-ip! danget
item.dc:creator: @raphie raphie
item.description:
@raphie wrote:

[quote=“Joshinator, post:5, topic:181632”]well, then how do i get other people to come on?
:mad:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2008, 11:55:23 AM[/size][hr]i tried registering it on server status using my no-ip ip but it says its offline… and i have server online[/quote]

well you logg in the 127.0.0.1 and they logg into your no-ip (other players) MMK? :D?!

Read full topic
